# BikeBuilders Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
React Native Android application for garage/vehicle service management system with SQLite database and Google Drive backup.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo
- SQLite (in-memory database)
- React Navigation (Stack + Drawer)
- React Native Paper (UI components)
- Google Drive API integration

## Project Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
	React Native Android app for bikeBuilders garage management system with SQLite database.

- [ ] Scaffold the Project
	Initialize React Native/Expo project with all necessary dependencies.

- [ ] Customize the Project
	Implement all screens, database schema, navigation, and features as per requirements.

- [ ] Install Required Extensions
	Install recommended VS Code extensions for React Native development.

- [ ] Compile the Project
	Install dependencies and ensure project compiles without errors.

- [ ] Create and Run Task
	Set up tasks for running on Android emulator/device.

- [ ] Launch the Project
	Provide instructions for launching on Android.

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	Update README.md with complete setup and usage instructions.
